name: Sonic 3D Blast 5
description: Sonic 3D Blast 5 is an unlicensed Sonic game for Game Boy. The main mechanics are similar to Sonic games. The player must reach the end of the level. To defeat enemies, the player can only jump on them. The player can die by touching enemies, spikes, or falling down in pit. The game has a total of 5 levels. There are no bosses in this game.
